analysis.description: CCP.isContract (/unique_chucks/12/0x988a6b099b6e42f6688eeef79ce7ccba0306fca7.sol#72-80) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x988a6b099b6e42f6688eeef79ce7ccba0306fca7.sol:
	Contract CCP has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x988a6b099b6e42f6688eeef79ce7ccba0306fca7.sol#109-110)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
